definitions: an illness that causes a person to become unable to move or walk properly

examples.text: multiple sclerosis is the number one crippler of young adults

shortDefinitions: illness that causes person to become unable to move

definitions: a thing that deprives someone or something of the ability to function normally

examples.text: ego is the biggest crippler of most businesses

shortDefinitions: thing that deprives someone or something of the ability to function normally
